dmca.title: Cease and Desist
dmca.body:
Finally, this letter should not be construed as a full recitation of the
facts supporting Robert's claims, and nothing contained herein is
intended to, or does, constitute a waiver of any right, remedy or position
of Robert's, each and all of which are expressly reserved.

Thank you for your anticipated cooperation in this matter.

Sincerely yours,

Robert Linsay
